parameters.name: PersistId
parameters.description: Persistent reference IDs returned by IModelDocExtension::GetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference or IModelDocExtension::IGetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference

title: IModelDocExtension.IGetSheetMetalObjectsByPersistReference
description: Gets the object, or objects, in a folded sheet metal part that correspond to the byte array of persistent reference IDs of an entity in a flattened sheet metal part.
signature:
System.Object IGetSheetMetalObjectsByPersistReference( 
   System.Int32
Count
,
   ref System.byte
PersistId
,
   out System.Int32
ErrorCode
)

parameters.name: PersistId
parameters.description: Persistent reference IDs returned by IModelDocExtension::GetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference or IModelDocExtension::IGetFlattenSheetMetalPersistReference

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of objects in a folded sheet metal part that correspond to the byte array of persistent reference IDs of an entity in a flattened sheet metal part VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
See
Persistent Reference IDs
for more information.
